question: Which state has introduced ‘Night safaris’ in its national parks?
explanation:
Madhya Pradesh has recently introduced night safaris in three of the national parks. This is expected to promote the tourism sector in the state.
Tourists and wildlife enthusiasts can witness the night-time animals in their natural habitat. The route of the safaris would be decided by the state and Tourists can book their night safaris on the Wildlife Safari Reservation portal.
